title: Shameful and Ridiculous: Anambra Govt Assists Couple Who Had Triplets With Only N2000 & a Bag of Rice
content: For Asiegbu Mmadubuko, a native of Akaeze village, Urum in Awka North LGA of Anambra State whose wife was delivered of triplets recently, his joy has been severely punctured. Rather than happiness, the family is writhing in deep agony.
